content: Oh right, I'm here to give you my most prized treasure — a precious... <style=SizeBig><style=Highlight>Luca Fruit</style>!</style>
info: 格连露卡-格连-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, the Luca Arbor has grown again! It feels like there's something new and exciting waiting to surprise us each and every day here!
info: 格连露卡-格连-复杂对话_主流程文本3

content: Thank you for helping me fulfill my dream of building a shop, and even more for nurturing the planet so wonderfully! <style=SizeSmall>Between us, I can't wait to see how the sky will look once we set this Luca Fruit in place...</style>
info: 格连露卡-格连-复杂对话_主流程文本3
